title: Zeus
description: The king of the gods, ruler of Mount Olympus, and god of the sky, lightning, and thunder.
quote: Even the bravest hero must face his fate.

title: Athena
description: The goddess of wisdom, warfare, and crafts. She is known for her strategic skill in battle.
quote: Victory belongs to the most prepared.

title: Poseidon
description: The god of the sea, earthquakes, and horses. He wields the trident as his symbol of power.
quote: The depths hold secrets no mortal can fathom.

title: Hades
description: The god of the underworld and the dead. He rules over the afterlife from his dark kingdom.
quote: All paths lead to my domain.

title: Heracles
description: A legendary hero known for his incredible strength and the completion of the Twelve Labors.
quote: No task is too great for the willing heart.

title: Medusa
description: A monstrous creature with snakes for hair whose gaze turns people to stone.
quote: Beauty can be both a blessing and a curse.

title: Cerberus
description: The three-headed dog that guards the entrance to the underworld.
quote: None shall pass without my permission.

title: Odin
description: The Allfather of Norse mythology, god of war, wisdom, and death.
quote: Knowledge comes at a cost.

title: Thor
description: The god of thunder and protector of Asgard, wielding the mighty hammer Mjölnir.
quote: With Mjölnir in hand, I defend the realms.

title: Loki
description: The trickster god, known for his cunning and mischief.
quote: Truth is often hidden beneath lies.

title: Freyja
description: The goddess of love, beauty, and fertility, as well as a master of magic.
quote: Love conquers all, even the coldest hearts.

title: Valhalla
description: The majestic hall where fallen warriors are taken by the Valkyries to feast with Odin.
quote: Only the bravest earn a place in Valhalla.

title: Fenrir
description: The giant wolf destined to bring chaos during Ragnarök.
quote: Chaos is my destiny.

title: Yggdrasil
description: The World Tree that connects the nine realms of Norse mythology.
quote: Through me, all worlds are united.

title: Hel
description: The ruler of Helheim, the realm of the dead in Norse mythology.
quote: In death, all are equal.

title: Mjölnir
description: The legendary hammer of Thor, capable of leveling mountains.
quote: Power unmatched, wielded by the worthy.

title: Apollo
description: The Greek god of the sun, music, and prophecy.
quote: Let the light guide your path.

title: Ares
description: The Greek god of war, known for his fierce and brutal nature.
quote: War is my domain.

title: Prometheus
description: A Titan who stole fire from the gods and gave it to humanity.
quote: For knowledge, I defy the gods.

title: Bifröst
description: The rainbow bridge connecting Asgard to Midgard in Norse mythology.
quote: A bridge between worlds, guarded by Heimdall.
